title: Pinus sylvestris 'Gold Medal' 5/2022 Scotch J2-
description: Pinus sylvestris 'Gold Medal' 5/2022 Scotch J2- (Scots Pine) Scotch Pine, Size at 10 years: 6x4ft., Gold, USDA Hardiness Zone 3, Michigan Bloom Month -, In Garden Bed J2 for 4.9 YEARS (Stanley). Planted in 2017. Buchholz & Buchholz Nursery: A slow-growing upright evergreen conifer with rich golden needles. Color is most intense in winter, but it is still rather gold in summer as well. Prefers full sun in well-drained soil. 5' tall x 3' wide in 10 years. Hardy to -50 degrees. USDA zone 2. A golden form of Scotch Pine. Leaves good gold all year. Plant grows 8-12 inches a year. Needs partial shade. Received 3/31/2017. Photo by F.D.Richards, SE Michigan. Link to additional photos of this plant from 2017, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22: www.flickr.com/search/?user_id=50697352%40N00&sort=da... #Conifer, #Golden, #ScotchPine, # Pinus, #PinusSylvestris
label: Original
